name: governance-v2-subgraph
description: This package contains governance subgraph for the Aave Governance V2

scripts.prepare:all: npm run prepare:contracts && npm run prepare:subgraph
scripts.prepare:contracts: rm -rf externals && npm run submodule:get:governance-v2 && npm run submodule:get:aave-token-v2 && npm run submodule:install && npm run submodule:compile-contracts
scripts.submodule:load: git submodule foreach npm run load:npm
scripts.submodule:compile-contracts: git submodule foreach npm run compile
scripts.deploy:hosted:kovan: NETWORK=kovan env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aschmidt20/governance-v2-kovan env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/governance-v2 env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted

author: AAVE <tech@aave.com>
